item.title: Jekyll Forman Guard Bundler
item.description: This post is a quick “How did I setup my Jekyll environnement ?”. We are going all the tools that are quite awesome in Ruby. Goal The goal is simple : I want to be able to install any dependent Gem with a on-liner command I want to be able to run a Jekyll server that auto updates. We are going to play with : Bundler, Guard and foreman.
